actions.description: Place an entity (ride or shop or staff) in the amusement park

parameters.x: The x position of the entity
parameters.y: The y position of the entity
parameters.type: The type of entity. Must be one of ride or shop or staff
parameters.subtype: The subtype of the entity to be placed. For rides, must be one of carousel, ferris wheel, or roller coaster. For shops, must be one of drink, food, or specialty. For staff, must be one of janitor, mechanic, or specialist
parameters.subclass: The specific instance of the entity to be placed. Must be one of yellow, blue, green, or red
parameters.price: The price of the ticket or item. Only for rides and shops.
parameters.order_quantity: The maximum order_quantity of inventory. Only for shops.

actions.description: Move an entity (ride or shop or staff) in the amusement park

parameters.type: The type of entity. Must be one of ride or shop or staff
parameters.subtype: The subtype of the entity to be moved. For rides, must be one of carousel, ferris wheel, or roller coaster. For shops, must be one of drink, food, or specialty. For staff, must be one of janitor, mechanic, or specialist
parameters.subclass: The specific instance of the entity to be moved. Must be one of yellow, blue, green, or red
parameters.x: The current x position of the entity
parameters.y: The current y position of the entity

actions.description: Remove an entity (ride or shop or staff). If the entity is a ride or shop, it will be sold for a price.

parameters.type: The type of entity. Must be one of ride or shop or staff
parameters.subtype: The subtype of the entity to be removed. For rides, must be one of carousel, ferris wheel, or roller coaster. For shops, must be one of drink, food, or specialty. For staff, must be one of janitor, mechanic, or specialist
parameters.subclass: The specific instance of the entity to be removed. Must be one of yellow, blue, green, or red
parameters.x: The x position of the entity
parameters.y: The y position of the entity

actions.description: Change the price and (as applicable) order_quantity of inventory for an attraction

parameters.type: The type of attraction. Must be one of ride or shop
parameters.x: The x position of the attraction
parameters.y: The y position of the attraction
parameters.order_quantity: The new maximum order_quantity of inventory. Only for shops.

actions.description: Set the research speed and topic(s) for the amusement park. Only available in medium or hard difficulty.

parameters.research_speed: The research speed. Must be one of none, slow, medium, or fast
parameters.research_topics: The topics(s) of research. Must be a subset of ['carousel', 'ferris_wheel', 'roller_coaster', 'drink', 'food', 'specialty']

actions.description: Retrieve a sample of information from guests

parameters.num_guests: The number of guests to survey

actions.description: Add a path tile to the amusement park. Only available in hard difficulty.

parameters.x: The x position of the path tile
parameters.y: The y position of the path tile

actions.description: Remove a path tile from the amusement park. Only available in hard difficulty.

parameters.x: The x position of the path tile
parameters.y: The y position of the path tile

actions.description: Add a water tile to the amusement park. Only available in hard difficulty.

parameters.x: The x position of the water tile
parameters.y: The y position of the water tile

actions.description: Remove a water tile from the amusement park. Only available in hard difficulty.

parameters.x: The x position of the water tile
parameters.y: The y position of the water tile

actions.description: runs the day without any new action
